title: Come, all ye saints of God, Wide thro' the earth abroad
author: James Borden

verses.text:
Come, all ye saints of God,
Wide thro' the earth abroad
Spread Jesus' fame;
Tell what his love hath done,
Trust in his name alone,
He is the lofty One,
Worthy the Lamb!

Hence, gloomy doubts and fears!
Dry all your mournful tears,
Swell the glad name;
To Christ, our gracious King,
Strike each melodious string,
Join heart and voice to sing,
Worthy the Lamb!

Hark! how the choirs above,
Filled with the Saviour's love,
Dwell on his name.
There, too, may we be found,
With light and glory crowned,
While all the heavens resound,
Worthy the Lamb!
